title: Chat Shadow Change?
body:
First of all, the HUD update is amazing! I love 99% of it. The way pretty much everything is where you need to see it. The death timers. The clearer map. The… ungh, so good!

However, what gives with the chat box change? The chat text with shadow is hard to read, and gives me a serious headache for some reason! Not to mention, it is actually pretty hard to see on maps like Howling Abyss (at least as of now, when it is still Butcher's Bridge).

Why make the change? It's not like anyone was actually complaining about the old dark chat box, surely? Can you change it back?
